issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description
BlackBerry 10.2 can run Android APK files. Installing an APK built in Titanium Studio successfully installs. However the analytic data sent from the device is incorrect.

It will send:
OS: Android
Platform: Android
Model: Z10

It has correctly identified the model of the phone, but not the OS and Platform.

h5.Steps To Reproduce
1. Create an Android application
2. Publish the application to an APK file
3. Install the APK onto the BlackBerry device

h5.Expected Result
Analytic data should show a BlackBerry install

h5.Actual Result
Analytic data shows an Android install
fields.summary: BlackBerry: Running APK files on BlackBerry devices sends incorrect analytic data.
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.9.1 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.1.201401061716
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.1.v20140106134045
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.3.1-beta
BlackBerry Device: Z10 (10.2.0.1055)

comments.body: Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
